ngClassifieds

This is the Classifieds main module. It includes all of our components for the app.

ngClassifieds Requires ui.router,ngMaterial

Module Components

Directive

Name Description
classifiedCard

Card directive for individual classified cards.

Type

Name Description
classifiedsCtrl

Classifieds controller
editClassifiedsCtrl

Classifieds controller for editing already existing classifieds.
newClassifiedsCtrl

Classifieds controller for making new classifieds.

Service

Name Description
classifiedsFactory

Provides connection to firebase firestore and loads the classifieds.
